name: VEGAS Movie Studio Project
summary: A VF file is a video-editing project created by the discontinued MAGIX VEGAS Movie Studio (formerly Sony Vegas Movie Studio). It contains project information, including the editing timeline, applied effects and transitions, and references to video and audio clips imported into the project. While MAGIX no longer develops VEGAS Movie Studio, its VEGAS Pro program still supports VF files.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
